item.description:
Let's have some fun and work on "expanding our comfort zone" Thursday night at Mickey's.

If you've never been there, Mickey's crowd is about as accepting as a Karaoke crowd can be (or maybe they're just tone deaf.) They clap even for the singers that sound like that cat howling in the alley at two am. So let's have a little liquid courage, pick a winner from the long song list, and throw caution to the wind.

If you want to be videotaped, you'll have to buy me a drink.

See you there!
Rick M.
603 315 9711
item.name: Karaoke Confidence Builder Night in Lowell
